Adult Drake.name: Adult Drake
Adult Drake.description: Fully grown drakes which are dangerous stalkers and pack hunters.

Archer.name: Archer
Archer.description: Ranged combatants with training is the use of bows.

Brigand.name: Brigand
Brigand.description: Villainous lawbreakers whether they be bandits, pirates, ruffians, or other knaves.

Commonfolk.name: Commonfolk
Commonfolk.description: Ordinary citizens of the world who have no exceptional adventuring skills or abilities.

Scout.name: Scout
Scout.description: Individuals trained in reconnaissance and advance exploration of unknown areas.

Spellblade.name: Spellblade
Spellblade.description: Spellblades are magically empowered warriors who weave spellcraft into their weapon attacks to create devastating strikes.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.description: You practice the oral and musical traditions of heroic storytelling to inspire courage in your allies, demoralize your foes, and be quick with unconventional solutions to problems.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: A rage-fueled warrior which prefers two-handed attacks using Heavy weapons.

Chomper.name: Chomper
Chomper.description: Beasts that rely on vicious bites from their oversized mouths.

Drakeling.name: Drakeling
Drakeling.description: Smaller or younger drakes which are individually undersized, but dangerous as stalkers who hunt in packs.

Elemental Mote.name: Elemental Mote
Elemental Mote.description: Motes are the smallest elemental embodiments that still take physical form. They are generally unintelligent and act according to environmental stimuli or following the instinctual direction of a nearby greater elemental.

Elemental Sprite.name: Elemental Sprite
Elemental Sprite.description: Sprites are lesser elementals which are embodiments of their raw element, but lack the sapience of their greater kin.

Elemental Visitor.name: Elemental Visitor
Elemental Visitor.description: Visitors are embodiments of raw elemental energy that assume forms that are vaguely humanoid in shape. Unlike their lesser kin, Elemental Visitors are are capable of communication and understanding, although their motivations are seldom aligned with those of mortals.

Elemental Wanderer.name: Elemental Wanderer
Elemental Wanderer.description: Wanderers are significant manifestations of elemental energy that assume a form that is imposing or majestic. They are self-aware, sapient, and understand that they unnatural interlopers when outside of their typical realm. They are often driven by some instinctive or premeditated purpose which has drawn them forth.

Fighter.name: Fighter
Fighter.description: Hardened melee combatants expert at weilding one-handed weaponry, shield, and heavy armor.

Grappler.name: Grappler
Grappler.description: Fighters who specialize in physically restraining their adversaries and rendering them susceptible to further attacks.

Justiciar.name: Justiciar
Justiciar.description: Justiciars are divine champions which bring the wrath and judgment of divine power to those who are wicked or unworthy.

Mage.name: Mage
Mage.description: A magic user which wields flame and electricity in battle.

Necromancer.name: Necromancer
Necromancer.description: Mages who exploit the power that lies in undeath, raising minions from the dead to serve their nefarious ambitions or extending their own lives through occult spellcraft.

Occultist.name: Occultist
Occultist.description: Magic users who practice spellcraft using otherworldly and eldritch forces.

Operator.name: Operator
Operator.description: Operators are experts at maneuvering in tense situations, able to balance shrewd political sense with cunning and decisive action.

Priest.name: Priest
Priest.description: Devout servants of the gods who derive their power through their faith and devotion to their deity.

Protector.name: Protector
Protector.description: Stalwart warriors who interpose themselves between their allies and peril, seeking foremost to protect themselves and others from harm.

Shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
Shapeshifter.description: Shapeshifters practice the arts of bestial transformation, a type of primal magic that is ancient and different than commonly practiced runic spellcraft.

Skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
Skirmisher.description: A relentless and determined melee combatant that uses a mix of agility and power to subdue foes.

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description: Rogueish characters who are adept in infiltrating areas they are not supposed to enter and taking things they are not supposed to have.

Trader.name: Trader
Trader.description: Your expertise is in traveling the world and facilitating the exchange of goods.

Tusker.name: Tusker
Tusker.description: Beasts that fight using their own mass, momentum, and sharpened tusks.
